truths: Release pink square B1 inside the pink special area SA1 and back away
Move to special area SA1 with block B1 and place it into special area and move to bottom right
Release B1 in SA1 then drive half of the way down towards B4
Release block B1 and head toward block B4.
cot:
The ground truth goals all specify that the pink square B1 should be released inside the pink special area SA1, and then the robot should move away or towards another block (B4). The predicted goal, however, only mentions moving the robot within SA1, without any reference to block B1 or what should be done with it.

The predicted goal is missing the critical component of interacting with block B1, which is a key part of the ground truth goals. Therefore, an agent following the predicted goal would not achieve the real goal because it does not include the action of releasing B1 in SA1.

The similarity level is (1) Incorrect.
